name: gaseous
description: Gaseous Server is a self-hosted platform for running private, ephemeral virtual desktops or apps in the browser. It uses containerized sessions and supports custom apps or databases via WebAssembly or VNC.
features: Ephemeral Desktops: Launch temporary virtual desktops that automatically destroy after use for enhanced security.
Browser-Based Access: Access applications and desktops directly through web browsers without client installation.
Containerized Sessions: Isolate each user session in separate containers for security and resource management.
On-Demand Workspaces: Spin up temporary workspaces for specific tasks with automatic cleanup.
WebAssembly Support: Run custom applications in the browser using WebAssembly for near-native performance.
VNC Integration: Connect to containerized applications via VNC for full desktop environment access.
Zero Persistence: Ensure no data remains after session termination for privacy and compliance.
Multi-User Support: Provide isolated, temporary environments for multiple concurrent users.
